Title: Merithra's Gambit
Description:
We are ready as we can be. Our guard is in place, and our trap ripe to spring.

The emerald preservers' magic is linked to Ysera's. Upon your signal, they will simultaneously drop the magical defense. This is what Galok's been waiting for. His forces will swoop in like carrion birds.

We await your word, $n.
ObjectivesText: Tell Ysera to drop the magical defense.

Objectives.Text: Ask Ysera to lower the Eye's defenses
